website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Pippens are classic-looking basketball-inspired kicks that would look great either as fashion items or as part of your collection. These Nike shoes are well-made, and this shows in their durable build and superb finishing. Plus points for their excellent grip and fit.A few were disappointed that it takes the shoes some time to break-in, but not too significantly that it has stopped them from enjoying their sneakers.
pros: Many users have described the Nike Air Scottie Pippen shoes as “thoroughly comfortable” because of their Air units
Plenty of reviewers have praised the design of the 90s-style lifestyle sneakers, which they call “neckbreakers.”
Several people have stated that Nike Air Pippen shoes are “must-cops” because they can stand toe-to-toe with the Jordans
A good number of testers have noted that the high-top sneakers had a perfect fit
A lot of purchasers have expressed pleasure that their favorite classic throwback shoes from Nike were given a re-release
Some people are pleased with the good ankle support that the Nike Air Pippen sneakers gave
The Air Pippen shoes have great colorways, according to some buyers
A few purchasers have remarked that Nike’s Scottie Pippen Air kicks are durable and obviously well-made
A small handful of consumers claimed that the leisure footwears are definitely worth the price
One customer is happy with the high-top lifestyle shoes’ traction
cons: Many reviewers have mentioned that the Nike Air Pippen shoes are too heavy and bulky
The midsole feels way too tall because of the full-length air units, making it feel like the user is wearing heels, several purchasers say
A few people have remarked that Pippen’s Nike Air kicks need breaking in
A couple of consumers have complained about the toe creases

customer_reviews.title: Super Basketball shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman and I've been playing basketball since I was 65 and soon to be 69. I wear a size 9 medium in a women's shoe but My BB shoes are a men's 8 medium and they fit perfectly. During the past 4 years, I've tried a number of basketball shoes and these are by far the best ones I've worn. They fit like a glove and provide plenty of support. I hope they don't quit making them!!!
customer_reviews.author: jlm14014

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. I had to wait a long time ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. I had to wait a long time to get a new pair. Why? Because I look for: 1 brand 2 quality 3 good shape 4 not a common shape 5 try to only I have them 6 player, (Jordan, Pippen, David Robinson) I bought a pair (1996 Charles Barkley) back in 2011, I love them, I bough those in 1996 First time, I used them for 5 years. I still using which I bought in 2011. Thank you, I love my brand new PIPPEN
customer_reviews.author: gyurka

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, cheap laces.
customer_reviews.text: Grew up watching Pippen and bought these shoes for my son who plays competitive AAU ball. Has a lot of toe protection and ankle support. The shoe is well made, except the laces. After only a month of wearing them only for indoor gym activity (probably 15-20 hours total), the laces stripped and are coming apart. Contacted Nike and they just referred me to a website that sells laces (Lace Labs). The laces are relatively cheap ($6), but it's just the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is heavy and fits big
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are a little on the heavy side of a normal high top shoe. The fit was big, since I normally wear a 9.5 size, this shoes more like a 10 or 10.5.... not to sure on the actual size Nike went with on this one, but it ain’t 9.5, that’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schtz

customer_reviews.title: Stiff in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Good stiff shoe. Was worried that the stiffness would be hinderance. Turns out the solid fit helps me plant and cut. Very happy with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Speed-Racer

customer_reviews.title: I love Nikes
customer_reviews.text: This is the only manufacturer that I can order my size online a the size is always correct. Great feel and comfort even on long days.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Old school Pippens!
customer_reviews.text: Classic throw back shoe! Love he old school Pippens. Had a pie of these in high school (almost 20 years ago) and saw these and wanted them. Fit great, look great, and they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are a great way to make a casual look pop a bit more with it's bold and junky design and contrast in black and white, comfy and i didnt get blisters, would recommend to add to your collection/wardrobe
customer_reviews.author: Steve, Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great old School Nike.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe reminds me of getting my first Jordan's or Pippen's in school when I was just a young lad. Only issues I had was I wore them to work and not a single person asked me how fast I could run in them or of they made me faster. Adults suck.
customer_reviews.author: Mickle Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty shoe.
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and very nice looking. Looks like a boot feels like a sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love them they fit very well they were a little tight at first but they have loosen up since thanks
customer_reviews.author: Julie Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like fhe style and the color of the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Felt great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Felt great. Unfortunately I received a miss matched pair one was a 10 and the other 10.5. Had to send it back. But when I tried them on they were super comfy. Wish they didnt mismatch the shoes in the box
customer_reviews.author: vr6veedub

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes. Exactly what he wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: ... many brands can have different sizes but these felt great and look great on my
customer_reviews.text: it's tough to buy sneakers online since so many brands can have different sizes but these felt great and look great on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, has a really good quality and was delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to see that the shoe I once owned back in 1995 was exactly as I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Retro Nike
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest retro shoes to own. Fits good looks good and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These new ones are Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Was so upset with myself 20 years ago,when I had toss my Pippins. They had some court miles on them. These new ones are Awesome.

customer_reviews.title: im very happy i have pair
customer_reviews.text: i have been looking for these pipens for a while, im very happy i have pair. the box was in horrible shape and not the original shoe laces but over all fast shipping and authentic kicks. so its all good.

customer_reviews.text: they could be a tad wider.A little snug but hopefully they will break in just fine.

customer_reviews.title: But great to sport around doing everyday
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy in my opinion to play ball in. But great to sport around doing everyday things

customer_reviews.text: AWESOME , exactly what I wanted . Got these cheaper than at my local footlocker on sale !

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Pippen Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Certainly the flagship of the summer, try this model Nike Air Pippen "Work Blue".
